name: Reflecteur
description:
Reflecteur is an amazing puzzle game in which your objective is to collect all the coins to unlock the doors, then you have to help both the players(real & replica) reach the doors to hop on to the next level. How to Play
  • Developer - Atharva Gangji
  • Pixel Art - PixelDuck,  Atharva Gangji
  • Written in - Python
  • Made in - A Week (I think so)
